name: Lewd Leaf Land - Maple Tea Ecstasy
name_original: Lewd Leaf Land - Maple Tea Ecstasy
description:
A small game about a Tanuki-girl waking up from the full moon and deciding to bounce out into the forest to collect leaves for a cup of tea.

This game is just a small demo room at the moment, alot of content still needs to be added!

Made for the Lewd Jam 3.

CONTROLS:
Move:   Arrow Keys / WASD
Jump:   Space / Y / Z
Glide:   Space / Y / Z in the air
